attributes.title: Absolutely horrifying
attributes.review: when I opened the app for the first time, it immediately crashed. Terrible layout, hard to navigate, and poorly put together. and then to add to the awful app, they were horrifying pictures of our president which were unappealing to the eye. if I could give this app a zero star review I would

attributes.title: A Disgrace to the App Store🥴🤢🤮😷
attributes.review:
When a friend told me an about an app about politics, I thought it was going to be ...worth my time. I was wrong. As soon as my friend showed me the picture of this app, I hurled all over my phone. I’m 69 years old, I shouldn’t have to through this! In conclusion, this Trump 2o2o app is a disgrace to the App Store...a total disgrace. 

Also, “do ya like jeeazzzz?”

attributes.title: what a traumatizing app😧
attributes.review: so i download the app and after it taking about 17 hours to install, i open it and see something disgusting. a video of an orange 🍊 dancing without a shirt on. i immediately closed the app but it was too late. i had already been so traumatized that i had to be rushed to the hospital and have brain surgery done on me. after a two day surgery i returned home but got curious again. maybe the app had glitched or something. but no, oh what a mistake i made. i open the app to see that same orange skinny dipping in a pool of blood. i will never be the same after seeing what i saw 😭😭

attributes.title: worst app EVER
attributes.review: this has to be the WORST app i’ve ever used. like who decided to give this man a platform let alone an app. i feel like my IQ dropped to 20 just by pressing the download button 🤢

attributes.title: ✨DISGRACE✨
attributes.review: When I first downloaded this app, a notification popped up saying it contained age restricted material. I knew from there I was in for a bumpy ride. I opened the app to a completely unprofessional layout with pictures of some Cheeto everywhere. I was so confused. I now know why it said age restricted. These are images I do not want my children to see. It is a disgrace to the human race.

attributes.title: No more Cheeto man
attributes.review: I got this app to see what’s going on with Cheeto. The app kept on crashing and I decided to delete it instead, when I heard noises coming from outside my window. It was him, he was building a wall outside my house while hissing at me! “TTHHHH” before I noticed he threw a brick at my window and it knocked me unconscious. I awoke to realize he stole all my Cheetos from the pantry.

attributes.title: Unexceptional
attributes.review: I cant believe this app is even allowed on the app store! I was just minding my business, trying to keep up with the Trump news and rally events. After 30 minutes, I got an alert from my bank that this app stole all my credit card information and bought a life supply of MAGA hats. What a scam! Don’t download this app.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE😔🙈🤢🤮
attributes.review: I opened the app and the first thing I was greeted with was a screen that said “welcome n*gger” then as it proceeded it kept crashing and then the FBI came to my house and shot my dog then kidnapped me and left me at a cotton field and said “start pickin blackie” so I had no choice but to start pickin. I am currently doing this review during my breaktime in the outhouse but I gotta go now, massa is calling... 🏃🏾‍♀️

attributes.title: Smelly
attributes.review:
R- r- r- roll up to the party with my crazy pink wig
But I can't get through the door because my booty’s too big
One percent is human, ninety-nine is plastic
Just a sec, I gotta fix my lips

attributes.title: Do not download 🥺
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because the Cheeto man is the man to support, or so I thought. After downloading the app my fridge then disappeared, and then one by one, everything else in my house started disappearing until everything I ever knew was gone, including myself. I am currently typing this review in the void I was sent to.
